# shinyjs

`shinyjs` lets you perform common JavaScript operations in Shiny applications 
without having to know any JavaScript.

## Installation

`shinyjs` is available through GitHub:

```
install.packages("devtools")
devtools::install_github("daattali/shinyjs")
```
